Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.0; WOW64; rv:2.0b12pre) Gecko/20110218 Firefox/4.0b12pre

App-tabs must not be treated as real tabs. Currently it's impossible to close Fx window by closing last normal tab while there are pinned app-tabs.

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open Firefox
2. Open 2 tabs and pin first one
3. Close second tab (which is normal tab)
Actual Results:  
Fox shows content of pinned tab (which is possible to close BTW, which is even worse :( ).

Expected Results:  
Close Firefox window if browser.tabs.closeWindowWithLastTab = true or open new tab if browser.tabs.closeWindowWithLastTab = false.
